name: RD MARS DEMO
description:
Content warning for epilepsy, motion sickness, or those sensitive to issues relating to mental health. 

RD Mars is a top-down shooter where you play as a robot exploring the mind and past actions of a man named Felix Darwins. RD Mars breaks away from genre conventions and delivers both a new mechanical experience and a deep and complex story for players to uncover. 

This is the demo version of RD Mars and is not representative of the final product. If you would like to give feedback and change the course of this game’s development, you can do so on the google form below.

https://forms.gle/AK5t6zQJkkY9eTFS8

You can also follow the development here:

https://twitter.com/tyeishing
